participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Emily is optimistic and friendly, often striving to see the best in every situation. She enjoys engaging in conversations and values connections with others.
participant_1.background: Emily has a degree in communications and works in public relations. She enjoys outdoor activities and has a passion for photography.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Michael is laid-back and humorous, with a knack for making people laugh. He likes to keep conversations light-hearted while still being approachable.
participant_2.background: Michael is an engineer with a strong interest in technology. He spends his weekends playing video games and exploring new hobbies.
